typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		AgingMethodology as string,
		MinimalAge as string,
		MaximalAge as string,
		FailureRateAtMinimalAge as string,
		FailureRateAtMaximalAge as string,
		ExternalFailureRatePerYear as string,
		IsQuantityDiscrete as string,
		GFlag as string,
		AgingFailureDelay as string,
		IsAgingAfterDeath as string,
		MaintenanceIfOutOfOrder as string,
		Shape as string,
		Scale as string,
		ExpectedLife as string,
		FinancialCostOfFailure as string,
		EnvironmentalCostOfFailure as string,
		NetworkCostOfFailure as string,
		ExtraNL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadUpdateAgingFamilies
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> AgingFamiliesStatus
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies, AgingFamiliesStatus exists(ReadUpdateAgingFamilies@Name == AgingFamiliesStatus@Name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistingNameInAgingFamiliesStatus
ExistingNameInAgingFamiliesStatus sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-520-NotExistingName.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteNotExistingNameRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies split(isNull(Name),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckMandatoryData@(MissingName)
CheckMandatoryData@MissingName sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-521-MissColumnName.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMissingNameRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(AgingMethodology))) ~> NonNullEnumAgingMethodology
NonNullEnumAgingMethodology filter(not(in(['Weibull', 'Gompertz', 'HealthScore'], AgingMethodology))) ~> AgingMethodologyEnumCheck
AgingMethodologyEnumCheck sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-523-AgingMethodologyInvalidRange.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteAgingMethodologyInvalidRangeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(MinimalAge))) ~> NonNullMinimalAge
NonNullMinimalAge split(not(isInteger(MinimalAge)),
	disjoint: false) ~> MinimalAgeTypeCheck@(MinimalAgeWrongType)
MinimalAgeTypeCheck@MinimalAgeWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-MinimalAgeWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMinimalAgeWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(MaximalAge))) ~> NonNullMaximalAge
NonNullMaximalAge split(not(isInteger(MaximalAge)),
	disjoint: false) ~> MaximalAgeTypeCheck@(MaximalAgeWrongType)
MaximalAgeTypeCheck@MaximalAgeWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-MaximalAgeWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMaximalAgeWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(FailureRateAtMinimalAge))) ~> NonNullFailureRateAtMinimalAge
NonNullFailureRateAtMinimalAge split(not(isFloat(FailureRateAtMinimalAge)),
	disjoint: false) ~> FailureRateAtMinimalAgeTypeCheck@(FailureRateAtMinimalAgeWrongType)
FailureRateAtMinimalAgeTypeCheck@FailureRateAtMinimalAgeWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-FailureRateAtMinimalAgeWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteFailureRateAtMinimalAgeWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(FailureRateAtMaximalAge))) ~> NonNullFailureRateAtMaximalAge
NonNullFailureRateAtMaximalAge split(not(isFloat(FailureRateAtMaximalAge)),
	disjoint: false) ~> FailureRateAtMaximalAgeTypeCheck@(FailureRateAtMaximalAgeWrongType)
FailureRateAtMaximalAgeTypeCheck@FailureRateAtMaximalAgeWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-FailureRateAtMaximalAgeWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteFailureRateAtMaximalAgeWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(ExternalFailureRatePerYear))) ~> NonNullExternalFailureRatePerYear
NonNullExternalFailureRatePerYear split(not(isFloat(ExternalFailureRatePerYear)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ExternalFailureRatePerYearTypeCheck@(ExternalFailureRatePerYearWrongType, ExternalFailureRatePerYearCorrectType)
ExternalFailureRatePerYearTypeCheck@ExternalFailureRatePerYearWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-ExternalFailureRatePerYearWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteExternalFailureRatePerYearWrongTypeRows
ExternalFailureRatePerYearTypeCheck@ExternalFailureRatePerYearCorrectType filter(or(toFloat(ExternalFailureRatePerYear) < 0.0, toFloat(ExternalFailureRatePerYear) > 1.0)) ~> ExternalFailureRatePerYearRangeCheck
ExternalFailureRatePerYearRangeCheck sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-523-ExternalFailureRatePerYearInvalidRange.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteExternalFailureRatePerYearInvalidRangeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(IsQuantityDiscrete))) ~> NonNullIsQuantityDiscrete
NonNullIsQuantityDiscrete split(not(isBoolean(IsQuantityDiscrete)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsQuantityDiscreteTypeCheck@(IsQuantityDiscreteWrongType)
IsQuantityDiscreteTypeCheck@IsQuantityDiscreteWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-IsQuantityDiscreteWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteIsQuantityDiscreteWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(GFlag))) ~> NonNullGFlag
NonNullGFlag split(not(isBoolean(GFlag)),
	disjoint: false) ~> GFlagTypeCheck@(GFlagWrongType)
GFlagTypeCheck@GFlagWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-GFlagWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteGFlagWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(AgingFailureDelay))) ~> NonNullAgingFailureDelay
NonNullAgingFailureDelay split(not(isFloat(AgingFailureDelay)),
	disjoint: false) ~> AgingFailureDelayTypeCheck@(AgingFailureDelayWrongType)
AgingFailureDelayTypeCheck@AgingFailureDelayWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-AgingFailureDelayWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteAgingFailureDelayWrongTypeRows
source(output(
		AgingFamily as string,
		AgentAgingFamily as string,
		HillParameters as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> UpdateAgingFamiliesMapFamilyPairHillParameters
UpdateAgingFamiliesMapFamilyPairHillParameters split(isNull(AgingFamily),
	isNull(AgentAgingFamily),
	isNull(HillParameters),
	isNull(Value),
	disjoint: false) ~> MapFamilyPairHillParametersMandatoryCheck@(MissingAgingFamily, MissingAgentAgingFamily, MissingHillParameters, MissingValue)
MapFamilyPairHillParametersMandatoryCheck@MissingAgingFamily sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-521-MissColumnAgingFamilyFamilyPairHillParameters.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMissingAgingFamilyRowsFamilyPairHillParameters
MapFamilyPairHillParametersMandatoryCheck@MissingAgentAgingFamily sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-521-MissColumnAgentAgingFamilyFamilyPairHillParameters.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMissingAgentAgingFamilyRowsFamilyPairHillParameters
MapFamilyPairHillParametersMandatoryCheck@MissingHillParameters sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-521-MissColumnHillParametersFamilyPairHillParameters.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMissingHillParametersRowsFamilyPairHillParameters
MapFamilyPairHillParametersMandatoryCheck@MissingValue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-521-MissColumnValueFamilyPairHillParameters.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMissingValueRowsFamilyPairHillParameters
UpdateAgingFamiliesMapFamilyPairHillParameters, AgingFamiliesStatus exists(AgingFamily == Name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> MapFamilyPairHillParametersExistenceCheck
MapFamilyPairHillParametersExistenceCheck sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-520-NotExistingAgingFamilyFamilyPairHillParameters.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteNotExistingAgingFamilyRowsFamilyPairHillParameters
UpdateAgingFamiliesMapFamilyPairHillParameters filter(not(isNull(HillParameters))) ~> NonNullEnumHillParametersFamilyPairHillParameters
NonNullEnumHillParametersFamilyPairHillParameters filter(not(in(['AmplitudeHill', 'OffsetHill', 'SlopeHill', 'IsFailureTransmitted', 'IsCouplingActive'], HillParameters))) ~> HillParametersFamilyPairHillParametersEnumCheck
HillParametersFamilyPairHillParametersEnumCheck sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-523-HillParametersFamilyPairHillParametersInvalidRange.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteHillParametersFamilyPairHillParametersInvalidRangeRows
UpdateAgingFamiliesMapFamilyPairHillParameters split(HillParameters == 'AmplitudeHill',
	HillParameters == 'OffsetHill',
	HillParameters == 'SlopeHill',
	HillParameters == 'IsFailureTransmitted',
	HillParameters == 'IsCouplingActive',
	disjoint: false) ~> MapFamilyPairHillParametersSplitKeyValues@(HillParametersAmplitudeHill, HillParametersOffsetHill, HillParametersSlopeHill, HillParametersIsFailureTransmitted, HillParametersIsCouplingActive)
MapFamilyPairHillParametersSplitKeyValues@HillParametersAmplitudeHill filter(not(isNull(Value))) ~> NonNullAmplitudeHill
NonNullAmplitudeHill split(not(isFloat(Value)),
	disjoint: false) ~> AmplitudeHillTypeCheck@(AmplitudeHillWrongType)
AmplitudeHillTypeCheck@AmplitudeHillWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-AmplitudeHillWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteAmplitudeHillWrongTypeRows
MapFamilyPairHillParametersSplitKeyValues@HillParametersOffsetHill filter(not(isNull(Value))) ~> NonNullOffsetHill
NonNullOffsetHill split(not(isFloat(Value)),
	disjoint: false) ~> OffsetHillTypeCheck@(OffsetHillWrongType)
OffsetHillTypeCheck@OffsetHillWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-OffsetHillWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteOffsetHillWrongTypeRows
MapFamilyPairHillParametersSplitKeyValues@HillParametersSlopeHill filter(not(isNull(Value))) ~> NonNullSlopeHill
NonNullSlopeHill split(not(isInteger(Value)),
	disjoint: false) ~> SlopeHillTypeCheck@(SlopeHillWrongType)
SlopeHillTypeCheck@SlopeHillWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-SlopeHillWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteSlopeHillWrongTypeRows
MapFamilyPairHillParametersSplitKeyValues@HillParametersIsFailureTransmitted filter(not(isNull(Value))) ~> NonNullIsFailureTransmitted
NonNullIsFailureTransmitted split(not(isBoolean(Value)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsFailureTransmittedTypeCheck@(IsFailureTransmittedWrongType)
IsFailureTransmittedTypeCheck@IsFailureTransmittedWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-IsFailureTransmittedWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteIsFailureTransmittedWrongTypeRows
MapFamilyPairHillParametersSplitKeyValues@HillParametersIsCouplingActive filter(not(isNull(Value))) ~> NonNullIsCouplingActive
NonNullIsCouplingActive split(not(isBoolean(Value)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsCouplingActiveTypeCheck@(IsCouplingActiveWrongType)
IsCouplingActiveTypeCheck@IsCouplingActiveWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-IsCouplingActiveWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteIsCouplingActiveWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(IsAgingAfterDeath))) ~> NonNullIsAgingAfterDeath
NonNullIsAgingAfterDeath split(not(isBoolean(IsAgingAfterDeath)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsAgingAfterDeathTypeCheck@(IsAgingAfterDeathWrongType)
IsAgingAfterDeathTypeCheck@IsAgingAfterDeathWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-IsAgingAfterDeathWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteIsAgingAfterDeathWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(MaintenanceIfOutOfOrder))) ~> NonNullMaintenanceIfOutOfOrder
NonNullMaintenanceIfOutOfOrder split(not(isBoolean(MaintenanceIfOutOfOrder)),
	disjoint: false) ~> MaintenanceIfOutOfOrderTypeCheck@(MaintenanceIfOutOfOrderWrongType)
MaintenanceIfOutOfOrderTypeCheck@MaintenanceIfOutOfOrderWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-MaintenanceIfOutOfOrderWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMaintenanceIfOutOfOrderWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(Shape))) ~> NonNullShape
NonNullShape split(not(isFloat(Shape)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ShapeTypeCheck@(ShapeWrongType)
ShapeTypeCheck@ShapeWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-ShapeWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteShapeWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(Scale))) ~> NonNullScale
NonNullScale split(not(isFloat(Scale)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ScaleTypeCheck@(ScaleWrongType)
ScaleTypeCheck@ScaleWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-ScaleWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteScaleWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(ExpectedLife))) ~> NonNullExpectedLife
NonNullExpectedLife split(not(isInteger(ExpectedLife)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ExpectedLifeTypeCheck@(ExpectedLifeWrongType)
ExpectedLifeTypeCheck@ExpectedLifeWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-ExpectedLifeWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteExpectedLifeWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(FinancialCostOfFailure))) ~> NonNullFinancialCostOfFailure
NonNullFinancialCostOfFailure split(not(isFloat(FinancialCostOfFailure)),
	disjoint: false) ~> FinancialCostOfFailureTypeCheck@(FinancialCostOfFailureWrongType)
FinancialCostOfFailureTypeCheck@FinancialCostOfFailureWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-FinancialCostOfFailureWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteFinancialCostOfFailureWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(EnvironmentalCostOfFailure))) ~> NonNullEnvironmentalCostOfFailure
NonNullEnvironmentalCostOfFailure split(not(isFloat(EnvironmentalCostOfFailure)),
	disjoint: false) ~> EnvironmentalCostOfFailureTypeCheck@(EnvironmentalCostOfFailureWrongType)
EnvironmentalCostOfFailureTypeCheck@EnvironmentalCostOfFailureWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-EnvironmentalCostOfFailureWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteEnvironmentalCostOfFailureWrongTypeRows
ReadUpdateAgingFamilies filter(not(isNull(NetworkCostOfFailure))) ~> NonNullNetworkCostOfFailure
NonNullNetworkCostOfFailure split(not(isFloat(NetworkCostOfFailure)),
	disjoint: false) ~> NetworkCostOfFailureTypeCheck@(NetworkCostOfFailureWrongType)
NetworkCostOfFailureTypeCheck@NetworkCostOfFailureWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-NetworkCostOfFailureWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteNetworkCostOfFailureWrongTypeRows
source(output(
		AgingFamily as string,
		HealthIndex as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> UpdateAgingFamiliesMapMapReferenceCostOfFailure
UpdateAgingFamiliesMapMapReferenceCostOfFailure split(isNull(AgingFamily),
	isNull(HealthIndex),
	isNull(Value),
	disjoint: false) ~> MapMapReferenceCostOfFailureMandatoryCheck@(MissingAgingFamily, MissingHealthIndex, MissingValue)
MapMapReferenceCostOfFailureMandatoryCheck@MissingAgingFamily sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-521-MissColumnAgingFamilyMapReferenceCostOfFailure.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMissingAgingFamilyRowsMapReferenceCostOfFailure
MapMapReferenceCostOfFailureMandatoryCheck@MissingHealthIndex sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-521-MissColumnHealthIndexMapReferenceCostOfFailure.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMissingHealthIndexRowsMapReferenceCostOfFailure
MapMapReferenceCostOfFailureMandatoryCheck@MissingValue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-521-MissColumnValueMapReferenceCostOfFailure.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMissingValueRowsMapReferenceCostOfFailure
UpdateAgingFamiliesMapMapReferenceCostOfFailure, AgingFamiliesStatus exists(AgingFamily == Name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> MapMapReferenceCostOfFailureExistenceCheck
MapMapReferenceCostOfFailureExistenceCheck sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-520-NotExistingAgingFamilyMapReferenceCostOfFailure.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteNotExistingAgingFamilyRowsMapReferenceCostOfFailure
UpdateAgingFamiliesMapMapReferenceCostOfFailure filter(not(isNull(Value))) ~> NonNullMapReferenceCostOfFailureValue
NonNullMapReferenceCostOfFailureValue split(not(isFloat(Value)),
	disjoint: false) ~> MapReferenceCostOfFailureValueTypeCheck@(MapReferenceCostOfFailureValueWrongType)
MapReferenceCostOfFailureValueTypeCheck@MapReferenceCostOfFailureValueWrongType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['1-522-MapReferenceCostOfFailureValueWrongType.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteMapReferenceCostOfFailureValueWrongTypeRows
